Tampa 33629|Orlando 32819|Jacksonville 32227|Venice 34825}

http://engineerdesigner.com

{http://engineerdesigner.com Orlando 32819 Residential Designer in Tampa 33629 http://engineerdesigner.com

The Engineer Designer produces fully designed and engineered plans of upscale homes, hangar homes, commercial places such as tenant improvement and renovation plans, as well as construction repair plans to replace homes and buildings damaged through flood, wind or fireplace.

He is unique among Professional Engineers in that he is a great award winning designer as well as having spent some 25 years in the field being a designer builder both designing and controlling his own construction projects. Any owner or perhaps contractor hiring the Engineer Designer can expect top quality design and presentations, expert structural and architectural engineering and the field savvy to know just how things are and can be done. This particular assures efficient and buildable jobs.

Ken Risley, the Engineer Designer, has operated inside the residential and commercial construction industry within Florida since 1976. He is a licensed Professional Engineer (PE32668) with emphasis within building, architectural and structural engineering; is a graduate of University of Florida from the University of Engineering and holds a State of Florida General Service provider Certification (CGC010458).

He has personally designed and built commercial structures of several types and residential projects of the wide variety.

The residential projects that the Engineer Designer has done have included Victorian Type Homes, Frank Lloyd Write styles, Early 20th Century styles, Modernist (contemporary and unique), Spanish Mediterranean, Craftsman, Florida Cracker, Hangar Homes, Cottages, A-frames, Mission Homes, Multi-Story Homes, Stilt Houses, Beach Homes and many, additional. The Engineer Designer has provided substantial forensic engineering and inspections for insurance companies, forensic companies and restoration contractors. The Engineer Designer’s commercial projects have integrated medical, veterinary and dental care offices, Old multi-story restoration of historic buildings, many types of office buildings and retail stores, preschools, Churches, Motorhome facitilies, warehouse among many others.

The Engineer Designer is NOT an “ivory tower” designer devoid of real-world encounter. “I design not only with an eye with regard to aesthetics, but also with a keen awareness of how it will be created - of what will the subcontractors might ask and what will they expect to see in the plans.“, Ken says.
Today the Engineer Designer focuses his expert skills on residential and commercial engineering and also design. He does so by providing outstanding and thorough design and building drawings ready for making it possible for and ready to build.

Professionally, he's got served as state-Chairman of Florida Engineers in Construction, Chairman of the Florida Engineering Professional Development Committee, and a past member of the particular Tampa Board of Real estate agents. As a Member of Florida Engineering Modern society, National Society of Expert Engineers, the Florida Energy Commission, he was picked as outstanding young engineer for Hillsborough and Pinellas Counties in 1986 as well as 1987. He also dished up as Chairman of the Code Enforcement Board in the Tampa Bay area for six years.

Among the Engineer Designer’s favorite projects are upscale residence design and engineering. Such homes include beautiful beach homes created on columns and to operate against the challenging forces that are possible during a hurricane. Furthermore he considers hangar homes to become a specialty. These are homes that are designed and built in flight handling communities where the owners have a home and airplane hangar mixture and where they retain their airplanes.

http://engineerdesigner.com Orlando 32819 Architectural Engineer in Jacksonville 32227 http://engineerdesigner.com

Through his corporation Mr. Risley operated a design construct business from 1982 until 2005. In 2005 he and his wife moved to Key Florida and began to supply only Engineering and Design services through the entire state of Florida and eventually in several parts of the country. “Providing Contracting services demands one to operate near his or her projects because 1 must be able to visit the undertaking, personally, on a daily basis. This limitations the size of the regions which can be covered. Engineering and Design, on the other hand, can be carried out more remotely. Because of the web and fast transportation I will provide top-notch engineering and design services to anyone, regardless of their location.”, Ken said. Focusing his professional services to only engineering and design, Ken and his wife were able to move to Central Sarasota and build their own dream home in the fly-in community and operate from there anywhere he chooses.

“My building years taught me much about construction and design. I began designing my very own projects in the late 70’s so that as I built them I learned and fine-tuned my design craft. I learned what glazers and masons, and the other trades, expect to see and pride myself on producing items that not only exceed professional standards of aesthetics and engineering, but in addition are accepted in the field by the men and women who will be building the projects.”

When an individual decides to work with the Engineer Designer he or she can expect a service beyond so what can be expected if other indicates are chosen. These include:

• Custom-made Design - either from damaged based upon interviews and conversations with the client, or because modifications and completion of perform perhaps already began by the client, or others, or even drawn by others and in demand for finalization and certification.

• Experienced Guidance as needed - whether one is not used to construction or a seasoned contractor, the Engineer Designer, based upon decades of experience, will either provide advice and advice to the novice or understand and skillfully work with the experienced builder. Any kind of client soon realizes that she or he is dealing with someone really familiar with all phases regarding design, engineering and construction.

• Sealed Plans prepared for permitting - The actual Engineer Designer produces construction documents that are ready for bidding, for bank loans, for permits and then for building. These are what you require in order to pull off a building project.

• High-End Home - The actual Engineer Designer can’t be beat as to design expertise. The particular Engineer Designer will find out what you need and ensure that it is delivered in a timely manner.
